name: National ID Card
classificationHints: identity card, national ID, government ID, carte d'identite, citizen ID

fieldDefinitions.full_name: Full legal name as shown on the ID
fieldDefinitions.date_of_birth: Date of birth of the ID holder
fieldDefinitions.gender: Gender as shown on the ID (M/F/Other)
fieldDefinitions.expiry_date: Expiration date of the ID card
fieldDefinitions.issue_date: Date the ID card was issued
fieldDefinitions.place_of_birth: Place of birth as shown on the ID
